available_services.name: JPG To PNG
available_services.description: Convert a JPG image, a commonly used method of lossy compression for digital images, to a PNG image, a lossless format that supports transparency.

available_services.name: WEBP To PNG
available_services.description: Convert a WEBP image, a modern format providing superior lossless and lossy compression, to a PNG image, a lossless format that supports transparency.

available_services.name: GIF To PNG
available_services.description: Convert a GIF image, a bitmap format that supports animation and uses lossless compression, to a PNG image, a lossless format that supports transparency.

available_services.name: BMP To PNG
available_services.description: Convert a BMP image, a raster format used to store bitmap digital images, to a PNG image, a lossless format that supports transparency.

available_services.name: ICO To PNG
available_services.description: Convert an ICO image, a format used for icons in Microsoft Windows, to a PNG image, a lossless format that supports transparency.
